title: Physical Education Design Strategies Utilizing Large Language Models

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary physical education theory and digital tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Most learners are active physical education instructors interested in educational content development based on language domain expertise

learning_goals: Learners can design physical education lesson plans using large language models in three methods: direct generation, generation after providing materials, and collaborative generation.
Learners can explain at least five criteria for evaluating the safety, accuracy, and appropriateness of generated physical education content.
Learners can identify potential issues in teacher-AI collaboration scenarios and propose improvement strategies.
Learners can develop an AI-integrated physical education model applicable to real-world professional settings through project-based learning.

resources: Physical Education Standard Textbooks and Curriculum
Digital Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Notion)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
